description:
The Good Wife series finale will air in May.《傲骨贤妻》全剧大结局将会在今年5月上演。

CBS used its Super Bowl broadcast to break the news that the critically-lauded legal drama will end after its seventh season. Nine more episodes will air.CBS在超级碗广告时间公布了这部好评颇高的律政剧将会在第七季大结局的消息，目前距离大结局还剩9集。

There had been rumblings of The Good Wife ending since its creators Robert and Michelle King announced they were departing to work on summer series BrainDead for CBS. A few weeks later, Good Wife star Julianna Margulies made a reference to her impending unemployment, seemingly confirming that the show was ending.之前《傲骨贤妻》的制作人Robert和Michelle King宣布将会在今年夏季结束后离开剧组，几个星期之后本剧女主演Julianna Margulies也宣布将会离开，所以CBS宣布《傲骨贤妻》被砍也是情理之中的事情。

The series finale will air Sunday, May 8 at 9/8c on CBS.《傲骨贤妻》大结局将会在北京时间5月9日上演。

title: 《傲骨贤妻》被砍！第七季大结局！
